trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when a method requires the caller to own the lock on a given Monitor, and the method is invoked by a caller that does not own that lock.
trans-unit.target: 方法要求呼叫端擁有指定 Monitor 的鎖定，但是不擁有鎖定的呼叫端叫用方法時所擲回的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Threading.SynchronizationLockException> is thrown by calling the <xref:System.Threading.Monitor.Exit%2A>, <xref:System.Threading.Monitor.Pulse%2A>, <xref:System.Threading.Monitor.PulseAll%2A>, and <xref:System.Threading.Monitor.Wait%2A> methods of the <xref:System.Threading.Monitor> class from an unsynchronized block of code.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Threading.SynchronizationLockException> 藉由呼叫會擲回<xref:System.Threading.Monitor.Exit%2A>， <xref:System.Threading.Monitor.Pulse%2A>， <xref:System.Threading.Monitor.PulseAll%2A>，和<xref:System.Threading.Monitor.Wait%2A>方法<xref:System.Threading.Monitor>未同步處理的程式碼區塊的類別。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Threading.SynchronizationLockException> uses the HRESULT COR_E_SYNCHRONIZATIONLOCK, which has the value 0x80131518.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Threading.SynchronizationLockException> 會使用 HRESULT COR_E_SYNCHRONIZATIONLOCK，0x80131518 的值。

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Threading.SynchronizationLockException>, see the <xref:System.Threading.SynchronizationLockException.%23ctor%2A> constructors.
trans-unit.target: 如需執行個體的初始屬性值的清單<xref:System.Threading.SynchronizationLockException>，請參閱<xref:System.Threading.SynchronizationLockException.%23ctor%2A>建構函式。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Threading.SynchronizationLockException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Threading.SynchronizationLockException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Threading.SynchronizationLockException" /> class with default properties.
trans-unit.target: 使用預設屬性，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Threading.SynchronizationLockException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Threading.SynchronizationLockException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示 <xref:System.Threading.SynchronizationLockException> 執行個體的初始屬性值。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: 屬性

trans-unit.source: Value
trans-unit.target: 值

trans-unit.source: `null`.
trans-unit.target: `null`。

trans-unit.source: The localized error message string.
trans-unit.target: 當地語系化的錯誤訊息字串。

trans-unit.source: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 解釋例外狀況原因的錯誤訊息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Threading.SynchronizationLockException" /> class with a specified error message.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的錯誤訊息，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Threading.SynchronizationLockException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Threading.SynchronizationLockException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示 <xref:System.Threading.SynchronizationLockException> 執行個體的初始屬性值。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: 屬性

trans-unit.source: Value
trans-unit.target: 值

trans-unit.source: `null`.
trans-unit.target: `null`。

trans-unit.source: The error message string.
trans-unit.target: 錯誤訊息字串。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> that holds the serialized object data about the exception being thrown.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" />，包含所擲回之例外狀況的相關序列化物件資料。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" /> that contains contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: 包含有關來源或目的端內容資訊的 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Threading.SynchronizationLockException" /> class with serialized data.
trans-unit.target: 使用序列化資料，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Threading.SynchronizationLockException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is called during deserialization to reconstitute the exception object transmitted over a stream.
trans-unit.target: 進行還原序列化 (Deserialization) 期間會呼叫這個建構函式，以便重新構成經由資料流傳送的例外狀況物件。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [XML and SOAP Serialization](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-and-soap-serialization.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[XML 和 SOAP 序列化](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-and-soap-serialization.md)。

trans-unit.source: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 解釋例外狀況原因的錯誤訊息。

trans-unit.source: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 做為目前例外狀況發生原因的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: If the <c>innerException</c> parameter is not <see langword="null" />, the current exception is raised in a <see langword="catch" /> block that handles the inner exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>innerException</c> 參數不是 <see langword="null" />，則目前的例外狀況會在處理內部例外的 <see langword="catch" /> 區塊中引發。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Threading.SynchronizationLockException" /> class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的錯誤訊息以及造成此例外狀況的內部例外狀況的參考，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Threading.SynchronizationLockException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 被擲回以做為前一個例外狀況直接結果的例外狀況，應該在 <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> 屬性中包含對前一個例外狀況的參考。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or `null` if the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> 屬性會傳回與傳入建構函式中相同的值；如果 `null` 屬性沒有提供內部例外值給建構函式，則傳回 <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Threading.SynchronizationLockException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示 <xref:System.Threading.SynchronizationLockException> 執行個體的初始屬性值。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: 屬性

trans-unit.source: Value
trans-unit.target: 值

trans-unit.source: The inner exception reference.
trans-unit.target: 內部例外狀況參考。

trans-unit.source: The error message string.
trans-unit.target: 錯誤訊息字串。
